node.detail_zh: 患者無外遊記錄，因長期病患經急症室入住伊利沙伯醫院內科病房，7 月 6 日開始咳嗽，7 月 9 至 10 日亦曾留醫明愛醫院內科病房，7 月 12 日確診後立刻轉往隔離病房。患者為第 #1545 宗個案患者的母親。同一內科病房內第 #1563 及 #1602 宗個案患者亦為確診個案。
node.detail_en: The patient has no travel history, and was admitted to the medical ward of Queen Elizabeth Hospital due to underlying health conditions. She began coughing on July 6, was admitted to the medical ward of Caritas Medical Centre on July 9 and 10, and was transferred to isolated ward upon diagnosis of the virus on July 12. She is the mother of patient #1545. Patients #1563 and #1602 who were in the same medical ward were also diagnosed positive later on.

groups.name_zh: 伊利沙伯醫院 A6 內科病房
groups.name_en: Queen Elizabeth Hospital's A6 internal medicine ward
groups.description_zh: 群組首名患者因長期病患於 7 月 12 日入住伊利沙伯醫院 A6 內科病房，其後入住同一病房的 7 名病人先後確診。
groups.description_en: The first patient of the cluster was admitted to medical ward A6 at Queen Elizabeth Hospital on July 12. Other seven patients of the ward have thereafter been diagnosed positive for the virus.
